title: Covid 4th Wave May Peak After June, Have Its Effects Till Oct, Warns Karnataka Health Minister | Mint - Mint
content: Covid 4th Wave May Peak After June, Have Its Effects Till Oct, Warns Karnataka Health Minister | Mint  MintView Full coverage on Google News
description: The Karnataka government on Monday decided to make wearing face masks and maintaining social distancing compulsory in the state amid fresh Covid-19 concerns in several parts of the country
